column1: 137kph, good length angled across and he plays well inside the line to let it go
back of a length, 138kph, on middle, he neatly tucks this off the back foot to fine leg
138kph, good length, he pushes forward and nudges this to cover-point
thick inside edge goes past leg stump! He was trying to cut but it was a touch too close but the inside edge bounces safely past leg stump
flicked off the hip over square leg! It was just an awkward jabbed pull that just cleared the infield and it bounced hard off the wide square and raced away
back of a length, off  stump, he defends with soft hands into the off side
139kph, shorter ball, rising into the ribs and he's back and jumping to knock this down
fuller and swinging down the leg side
fuller on off, he drives but mistimes back to the bowler
140kph, good length, swinging back in, takes him on the thigh pad, hint of shape
139kph bouncer, this flies way over his head, he ducked under it easily. No wide call. Plenty of bounce and pace though
shorter on the hip, it comes off the thigh guard as he tries to glance
he drives a fuller ball, slicing it off a thick edge towards third man
beaten, prodding at a cracking delivery that nipped off the seam outside off
137kph, back of a length on off, he's back and defending with the full face
140kph, slightly over-pitched and he leans into a well controlled cover drive into the gap. Nice stroke, didn't over hit it
141kph, fuller outside off, he drives harder but gets it off a thick inside towards square leg
135kph, play and miss trying to drive on the up as it zipped past the edge
fuller again, 140kph, he drives but doesn't time it, picking out cover-point
141kph, shorter length, he's back and opening the face and running this to third man
140kph, good length, hint of shape back, he works this neatly to the gap at wide mid on
145kph, wider, not a half-volley, he frees the arms to drive but mistimes to mid off
142kph, fuller and swinging into the pads, it runs towards fine leg for a leg bye
145kph, fuller outside off, he tries a big expansive drive, gets a thick inside edge that runs behind square for a couple
144kph, good length, angled across and he's happy to leave this alone
139kph, shorter length, wide of off, he sits back and opens the face running it to wide third man
140kph, good length, leg stump, he works this neatly to the gap at midwicket
cracking front foot pull shot! This was a half-tracker, no venom, he stood up and smoked it over forward square, one bounce four. Super shot
And again! Even better. Slightly shorter and wider, he climbed all over it smashed this over wide mid on!
134kph, good length on off, he defends with soft hands trying to get it to third man but second slip cuts it off

edged between first and second slip! Oh no! Change of angle, coming in and nipping away, he pushed at it with limited footwork, Faf moved to his right at second and then pulled out of it and watched it go past, Markram didn't move having seen Faf move! If flew between them at catchable height!
fuller swinging into the pads but pitching outside leg
137kph, short lifter angled outside off, he rises and withdraws the bat inside the line
a bouncer flies over the keeper's head! Five wides. It was way too short and de Kock jumped as high as he could but it cleared him!
good length, he defends into the covers, wants one but is wisely sent back as the fielder pounces
lovely square drive on the up! It was a good length and wide of off, he didn't time it perfectly but controlled it and placed it through point and it raced away
good length, 145kph, angled across and he leaves
rearing bouncer, he fends off the glove onto shoulder and it pops up but falls safe! Well short of de Kock running in
edged along the ground wide of second! Again it drew the edge, half forward but lovely soft hands this time and it runs wide of du Plessis and away fine of third
over-pitched and driven magnificently down the ground! Glorious shot this. It was a half-volley but his footwork and weight transfer was superb to drive it past the bowler, straight of mid off
141kph, full again, he gets a thick inside edge driving but it goes safely along the ground to fine leg
135kph, good length, top of off, he's forward covering the line, defending off the inside half of the bat
134kph, fuller, he defends back to the bowler, Ngidi fields and fires a throw at the stumps and Tamim has to defend it away from his body with his bat! Everything is ok though. No one is worried
Crunch through midwicket! Too short and Tamim latches onto a pull and pounds it through the big gap at midwicket
shorter length, he's squared up but defends it well enough
beautifully guided fine of third man! Lovely placement and control. Shorter length and a fraction wide, with the angle he opened the blade and guided it away wide of slip
edged short of de Kock! He tried to guide fine again, got a bottom edge but it bounced short of the keeper
Superb cover drive! Supreme stroke from Soumya. Slightly over-pitched and just played the text book cover drive with a touch class.
shorter length, 145kph, he's back and trying to run it to third man, du Plessis flies across from second slip and saves it on the bounce
142kph, back of a length, wide of off, he leaves this alone
127kph, shorter length, on the hip, it comes off the thigh guard and runs to fine leg for a couple of leg byes
caught behind! Well bowled. Angled in back of a length, it nipped away off the seam, he was squared up on the back foot, forced to play, gets a thin edge and an easy catch for de Kock!
126kph, good length, angled in, he defends comfortably on the front foot
132kph, powerful square drive and JP Duminy makes a flying stop at backward point! Duminy flew like Jonty Rhodes to make that save
132kph, shorter length, tucking him up, he defends on the back foot
133kph, top of off, he defends from the crease
143kph, fuller and shaping away and he drives but misses
139kph, shorter wide of off, he rides the bounce and runs this to third man
square drive on the up through point! Some width offered and on the front foot he flashed the hands through it and placed it perfectly into the gap
big flash and miss trying to square drive again. Beaten for extra bounce
138kph, good length, top of off, he defends on the front foot
145kph full outside off, he steers this off the front foot to backward point

Huge appeal for LBW. Given not out. Faf reviews quickly. From around the wicket, angled in and nipping back. He was caught on the crease and hit just above the knee roll. No bat. Ball tracking says umpire's call. Not out remains. Ball tracking had it hitting the top of leg. South Africa keep the review but Soumya survives and they get a leg bye
good length, he's running this with an open face to third man
driven powerfully up and over cover! Too full and wide and he threw the hands through it, didn't bother to keep it down, just smashed it over cover!
131kph, bouncer, high and and angled down leg, not called wide? That was very high and angled down. Some leeway given there by Joel Wilson
fuller wide of off, he slices it on the front foot through gully to wide third man
full and swinging down the leg side and this is wide
129kph, good length, fourth stump line, he defends on the front foot to cover-point
back of a length outside off, he pushes off the back foot to backward point
good length, 136kph, on middle, he works it with the angle behind square leg
138kph, fuller on leg, he glances with the angle to fine leg

Caught behind! A short ball gets him due to a lack of pace! It was banged in and angled down leg, he shaped to pull, it held in the surface, he got through the shot too soon, it comes off the gloves and pops up behind him, de Kock sprinted forward dived and took an excellent catch
136kph, back of a length on off, he is back and across and defending
short and wide and a cracking cut shot over backward point! he thumped this. Didn't bother to keep it down. Just thrashed it flat behind point. Super shot to get off the mark
130kph, shorter outside off, he mistimes a pull to mid on
133kph, good length, on off, he defends on the front foot
angled into leg, 130kph, he turns this around the corner behind square
130kph, shorter outside off, he sits back and waits and pulls with control but with no timing behind square
130kph, back of a length, outside off, he's back and running this with an open face to third man
127kph, full on leg stump, he clips this neatly into the gap at midwicket
139kph, full angled into off, he drives neatly but straight to mid on
134kph, back of a length, outside off, he leaves as it climbs through to de Kock
138kph, good length, he's defending from the crease
138kph, shorter and wider and he cuts but straight to backward point
136kph, short and wide and he cracks a cut shot to deep point
135kph, chest high short ball, he pulls with control behind square to the sweeper
128kph, good length, on off, he defends on the front foot
132kph, fuller, he drives getting a thick inside edge to fine leg
129kph, short and wide, he is back and running this to third man with a controlled late cut
short and down leg, he tried to pull and misses but it's not called wide
132kph, angled into off, he turns this from off the stumps behind square to fine leg
126kph, very full angled into off, he drives firmly straight to mid on
welcome back, says Shakib as he drives this on the up to sweeper cover

takes him on with the pull, absolutely no control whatsoever as he took his eyes off but boy, this flies over the ropes at fine leg. It's a big boundary there, the fine leg fielder was in with a chance for a split-second but it kept going away.
helps the pull along to deep square
rides the bounce as he bunts this down to third man
floats this on the pads, flicked to deep square leg
takes on the pull and hits this all along the ground to deep square leg
tossed up on middle and leg, worked to midwicket
shortens his length a hint, tucks this behind square on the leg side
rocks back and cracks the cut to Miller at deep point
defends back to the bowler
splits the gap between point and short third man. Played this really late, cut this off the keeper's gloves nearly. Very good execution, picked the length early. Pristine to say the least
good stop by Rabada at point, didn't time this cut shot as well as he would've liked
tucks this shortish delivery into the leg side
defends this with the spin to the off side
works to short fine and scampers a quick single as the throw comes in flat at the bowler's end. Would've been in anyway
driven on the up to sweeper cover
shortish on middle and leg, he goes back and across to tuck it wide of midwicket
drifts away, Shakib slices the drive to short third man
too full, drilled straight to extra cover
nurdles behind square on the leg side for an easy single
shortish on middle, makes room and punches to long-off
steps out to slap this wide of mid-off, can't pick the gap.
unfurls his wrists beautifully. Opened the bat face very late to ease this cut wide of backward point. Slight misfield there and it really shouldn't have breached that wall.
defends this flat delivery back to the bowler
fired full on middle and leg, he sweeps and sweeps well, but there's a misfield at short fine leg. Morris the man, right through his hands
huge appeal for lbw as Mushfiqur goes a long way across to paddle, hit on the pad but Faf thinks it's pointless as he was hit way outside the line
squeezes this short ball to point
squeezes this fullish delivery to deep cover
eased with the spin to mid-off as they amble a single
flatter length ball on off, defended from the crease
full on the pads, works this wide of midwicket
drifting into middle and leg, he works this to square leg, sensible from these two
fired full on the pads, worked to deep square leg
drifts in a long way, Shakib looks to tuck it square, gets an inside edge that rolls to short fine
lobs off the pad to the leg side as he looks for a delicate little tap
eased with the spin to long-off
off a thick edge! Races past slip. This is a googly which Shakib looks to ease behind point, gets the edge to run away to the third man boundary
bunts it down the ground for an easy single
drilled into the gap at wide long-off, touch too full from Tahir
gets well forward and smothers this tossed up delivery
walks across and sweeps this from middle and off to deep square, opened up the gap nicely. Hit it all along the ground
dabs it with the turn to short third man
driven back to the bowler
toe-ends a pull to long-on, this one kept a touch low

steps out and lofts to clear the infield. Wanted to hit it over mid-off, but ended up slicing it over cover. Not convincing but runs nonetheless. Long-off came inside the ring, hence the urge to step out. Loops away to the boundary
digs this out, down to long-on. Was fired full and flat
eased down to long-on
pulls this into the leg side
angles one in from wide of the crease, defended
width and he crashes this Sehwag style to deep point. Got right on top of the bounce
dabs this down to third man
driven straight to extra cover
slants one back into middle and leg, worked to deep backward square leg
pulled all along the ground to deep square leg
rocks back and slaps this to the extra cover boundary. Acres of open space between deep point and long-off. Poor ball first up from JP
cut away to deep point for an easy single
drifts in from around the stumps, defended back
too full on the pads, flicked to deep midwicket
leading edge but falls short. Turned the bat face too early
fired full outside off, Mushfiqur gives himself some room and belts this through extra cover. Weight transferred fully forward as he blasted this. Terrific timing
bunts this length delivery to extra cover
rides the bounce and steers this behind the stumps, wide of backward point
pulled, took his eyes off, but was hitting it along the ground to deep square
slower and fuller on the stumps, check-driven to short cover
squeezes this drive to mid-off, wanted a single but that would've been steeped with risk

top-edges the pull, no one at fine leg. Brave from Shakib to take him on. Brings up his fifty and The Oval roars. Scores and scores of Bangladeshi fans in the crowd wave the flag. This has been a very sensible knock
runs this down to third man
angling into middle and leg, tucked to deep square
controlled pull down to fine leg, on the bounce to the fielder
overbalanced as he's hit on the pad trying to play across the line, saved by an inside edge
cut hard but straight to point
scintillating pull, down to deep square. Picked the length early and went through with the stroke
dismissed from his sight! Length outside off and Shakib heaved this across the line into the vacant wide long-on region
squeezes this yorker-length delivery to point
climbs into this pull, down to deep square. Fifth century stand for these two in ODIs
slower and fuller on middle and leg, tucked to square leg
slips this length ball down leg, good take. Zipped through to QDK
hops back and nudges this short of length delivery to square leg
pulled along the ground to fine leg
slower and fuller outside off, defended from the crease
nearly chopped on! Looking to cut, no room, thin inside edge on the bounce to the keeper.
dabs with soft hands, rode the bounce nicely
superb execution! What a way to bring up his fifty, Bangladesh's Mr Consistent. His 34th ODI fifty. Banged in short outside off, he rides the bounce and cuts over point. Third man had no chance.
gets it high on the bat as he shapes to pull, on the bounce to mid-on
slower and fuller on the pads, flicked to deep midwicket
gets a thick outside edge to short third man
makes room and creams this to deep cover
works this down to long-on
swept fine, no chance for short fine. Poor bowling from Tahir, drifting down leg and Mushfiqur gleefully accepts
brings out the audacious reverse-sweep, gets a thin bottom-edge to short third man. Not worth the risk
cut away to deep cover
chops this down to square third man
scythed away! Width outside off, he waits, waits and then cuts hard to find the gap behind point. Down to the boundary rider
delicate little late cut to third man
gets this to angle back in, rolls off a thick inside edge to midwicket as he looks to drive through mid-on
bounced him, nearly did! Looks to hook but is beaten for pace.
cut hard, straight to point
tucks this to square leg
mistimes this hoick back to the bowler, off the toe-end
defended to short third man, looked to cut but didn't have the width he would've liked
works this low full toss to mid-on, hint of a misfield giving rise to a mix-up, Shakib turns back. He really wanted a run
stunning placement! This is a buffet ball from Tahir, wallops this juicy full toss into the gap at midwicket.
whips this down to long-on
bunts this down to third man
steered behind point to square third man, rode the bounce nicely
driven hard, straight to mid-off
right on top of the bounce as he buns this behind square on the off side as they scamper a single

thick edge, but races to the third man boundary where the ball beats Tahir. Edge found, but no luck for South Africa. This climbed on him but Mushfiqur played it with soft hands by taking the bottom hand off the grip.
just lets this quick delivery to zip through
tossed up, he drives off a thick edge and it runs to short third man
very full, he digs it out back to the bowler
looped up on off, he sweeps along the ground to deep backward square
leg break wide of off, he drives powerfully but straight to deep cover
full toss, he lofts this down the ground but it's not well timed, placed nicely straight of long off for a couple
edged and it goes fine of short third man! It was a full wrong un, he leaned back to drive, got a thick edge and it ran fine beating the man on the circle
shorter length, top of off, he's back and defending to backward point
shorter into the ribs, he defends with soft hands close into the leg side but the man races in to prevent one
back of a length, on off, he defends with soft hands into the off side and they call quickly and run brilliantly to get ine
full and wide of off, he climbs into a drive but can't beat cover

bouncer he tries to pull and misses, huge appeal for caught behind, not out is the call. South Africa review. He's missed this by some margin. Nothing on snicko. Not out remains. South Africa lose the review
wide full toss, he hammers a square drive to deep point, Miller misfields but they only get one

Bowled him! Tahir makes the breakthrough! He exposed his stumps stepping outside off early to sweep behind square to the vacant boundary, it was very full, he missed the sweep because of the length, and it crashed into middle and leg!
flatter on off, he's back and defending
leg break, tossed up outside off, he steps forward and defends
full toss and he slog sweeps with ease over deep midwicket! Just short of a six! That was a gift
tossed up outside off, he pushes off the front foot through cover-point
flatter and fuller, he drives back to the bowler
cuts him in half nipping back from outside off past the inside edge and over off stump
141kph, back of a length outside off, he defends off the inside edge onto pad and it drops down
146kph, but sprayed well down the leg side and called wide
141kph, rearing short ball up into the ribs, he's up on his toes and defending awkwardly but effectively
another short lifter outside off, he rides the bounce and knocks it down into the gully
139kph, back of a length wide of off, he leaves this alone
146kph yorker, he jams down on it and keeps it out. Well bowled and well played
87kph, pushed through flat outside off, he gives room to cut but misses
slower and shorter on leg, he's back and working this behind square
off break on off, not much turn, he sits back and punches back to the bowler
short drag down, he steps across and whacks a pull shot over deep square! Bad ball and met by Mithun targeting the short side
tossed up and smoked along the ground straight! It was hammered past Markram and he couldn't stop the bullet!
a little lap sweep to a full toss but didn't get it fine enough to beat short fine leg on the circle
133kph, short ball, gets a little big but he controls the pull well enough to the sweeper
off cutter slower ball wide of off, he tries a front foot cut but misses
137kph, good length, top of off, he defends with soft hands to the gap at cover-point for a single
136kph, high short ball, he pulls with control in the air behind square into the gap for a couple. Well placed
133kph, back of a length, angled in, he tries to turn to leg, gets a slight leading edge to cover but it is along the ground
137kph, short ball, he swivels and pulls but straight to fine leg
leg break, tossed up, he pushes on the front foot to cover
drifting into leg stump, he works this forward of square to the sweeper
drifting into leg, he works it against the turn through forward square

played on! He was wiping across the line with with a big slog sweep and was bowled off the inside edge! Clever bowling. It was the top spinner, Mithun was playing for the leg break, he lifted the hit trying to launch it over deep midwicket, and it went off the inside edge onto leg stump.
leg break tossed up, he drives firmly to long off
short and wide, he's back and cutting to deep point
shorter outside off, he checks a pull shot, bouncing it back to the bowler
shorter ball, he is back and pulling to fine leg
135kph, back of a length and it zips through wide of off, he tries to cut but misses. Beaten for pace
good lifting bouncer, he sways underneath it to let it pass outside off
134kph, good length outside off, he sits back and steers this to backward point
136kph short into the ribs, he's cramped on the pull picking out the man in the ring behind square
top spinner on off, he uses the wrists to turn this behind square for a single
drifting into leg, he clips this with the drift to the gap forward and square and superb running yields two
very full outside off, he drives neatly through cover-point to the sweeper
looped outside leg, he clips this elegantly to deep midwicket
wrong un, well bowled, he's hit on the pad, big appeal for LBW and it's given not out. No reviews available
tossed up on off, he steps forward and defends

caught at deep point! This is a huge blow for Bangladesh! He advanced and moved leg side, got the short wide ball he was looking for but slapped the cut shot in the air straight to van der Dussen on the rope at backward point and he held the dipping catch well.
131kph, back of a length outside off, he sits back and runs this to third man
short and wide, 129kph, he tries to cut but plays over the top of it
132kph, angled down leg and it comes off the thigh and flies fine for four extras! Not a great delivery
124kph, back of a length outside off, he stands tall and punches off the back foot to deep point
127kph, short ball, he tries to pull getting inside the line but just punches it off the gloves towards fine leg
leg break outside off, he opens the face and runs to short third man, Rabada is forced to make the diving save
wrong un, tossed up, he reads it and defends on the front foot
looped up, he drives back to Tahir who can't quite complete the diving save, they pinch one as it rolls past the stumps at the non striker's
shorter wrong un, he's back to create room and punching this to the gap at cover-point
flatter on middle, he's back and covering up in defence
googly, quite straight, he's taken on the pad, a big appeal from Tahir only for LBW, given not out. No reviews of course. That was close
good length, 129kph, wide of off, he late cuts to third man for a single only
130kph, short bouncer, but the pace in this surface is inconsistent, he miscues a pull forward of square
114kph, slower ball, outside off, he tried to work through the off side but drags it back to the bowler
full on leg stump, he flicks this along the ground behind square to the sweeper
top edge over the keeper and it lands just short of the rope! It was a good bouncer, he tried to swat a pull shot over midwicket, got a top edge that flew high and safe for four

slaps this pull shot through mid on! No mid on in place with these short balls being banged in, it was wide of off, he reached out and slapped a pull shot through mid on and no one was there to stop it!
142kph full into leg stump and he glances this away with easy behind square
138kph, back of a length outside off, he sits back and just pushes this to backward point
116kph, slower ball, he bunts this short of backward point
140kph, low full toss, he pushes it past midwicket and the man misfields in the ring to allow a two!
140kph shorter outside off, he angles the face and runs this to third man with control
138kph low full toss, clips through midwicket

Rabada drops it at deep backward square! It was a slower ball, he swung it away high to deep backward square, Rabada ran in initially and then had to turn and run backwards, he got both hands on it but dropped it and it bounced over the rope!
fuller, he pushes down the ground
slower ball, wide of off, he backs away and toes this down long on
134kph, back of a length outside off, he opens the face and runs to third man
heaved through midwicket! It was a short ball again, he opened the hips up and slapped this hard along the ground to deep midwicket and beat the man on the rope with the power

smoked though cover-point! This was fuller outside off, he cleared the front leg again but reacted and threw his hands through the line, the timing was amazing to beat the point sweeper! He stood no chance!
108kph slower ball outside off, punched to the man on the cover ring and they get one
wide slower ball, he reaches out and places this behind point for a couple
short and wide, he cuts late but the man on the ring makes a superb save to prevent extra runs
high full toss outside off, surprises him as he misses, but it was below waist high
leg cutter slower ball but dragged way wide of off and called wide
he charges early, Phehlukwayo fires way too wide again! This was nearly off the cut strip. It was a knuckle ball
yorker, 127kph, on off, he turns this away to deep square, the throw from the deep hits the stumps at the striker's and it ricochets away fro another run!
109kph, slower ball, he backs away and lofts this inside out wide of long off, Duminy runs around and makes a diving save to prevent four
slower ball, he walks at the bowler and works the length to the gap at midwicket near the circle and they sprint an easy two
full angled into middle, he rifles this wide of long on along the ground to pick up two more
glanced fine for four! He stepped outside leg, Morris followed with a shorter ball, he tried to pull, took one hand off the bat and got it fine and it raced to the rope!
heaved over deep midwicket! The man on the rope was 15m in, the swatted strike went flat and just over his head and landed inside the rope, one bounce four!
132kph, bouncer down leg and called wide!
charges and creates a half-volley but the sweetly struck square drive flies straight to the man on the cover-point rope

chipped to mid off! It was a low full toss, he sat deep in his crease to try and loft over mid off, but just chipped it off the toe of the bat straight to Phehlukwayo on the circle and he took the simple catch with no celebration at all
launched over square leg into the stands! A length ball in the slot on leg stump, he shipped this up and over forward square with immense power!
slower ball on off, he dabs this to backward point for a single
cracked over cover! Some shot this first ball. He cleared the front leg, got a length ball outside off and just caressed it up and over cover!
length slower ball, he charges and swings hard but misses
high short ball outside off, he reaches up and swats it down off the toe of the bat to midwicket for one
he charges and drives powerfully through cover, Miller has a long chase on the rope and he makes a great diving save to keep it to two!
Oooooh, good ball. Skiddy length ball, swerves in a hint, de Kock chops this wide of the stumps.
defends back to the bowler as he shows the full face of the bat
pacy length ball that nips back in to thud into the thigh pad as he looks to work it square on the leg side
squirted off a thickish inside-edge to mid-on
cracking stroke! Punched, bounces over backward point's head and races away to the boundary.
looks to work this behind square, but is done in by the bounce as he's hit on the thigh pad again. Good first over for Bangladesh
squeezed to long-on, the length was a touch too full
edged and four! Goes for a square drive, but the turn means he gets a thick outside edge that races past slip and short third man.
eases gently past the bowler to long-off
shortish on middle and leg, punched to deep midwicket
dabs to short third man for a quick single
turns this to square leg as they get across for a quick single
steers this length ball to point
leans into the drive but can't quite caress it into the gap. Well stopped at point
short of length ball on middle,  gets it to cut away and Markram defends back
tight line, angled across the batsman, around the fourth stump, defended
looks to ride the bounce and bunt this behind square, nearly chops on!
gorgeous! Too full and punished as he laces this into the gap at extra cover. Good effort by the fielder running back
slider from around the stumps, tucks this to square leg
gets well forward and defends solidly
a little too short and de Kock rocks back, making room to cut the ball off the stumps
slows it down, and tosses it up into the pads. de Kock blocks
draws him forward with a fullish delivery outside off, blocks
attempts an inside out drive as he sees the ball tossed up outside off. Can't hit the gap at cover
steps forward and blocks the fullish delivery on off stump
drives on the up, seeing as there's room for him to free the arms, but cover moves to his right and stops it well
beats him with a 140 kph delivery that pitches on a good length, tempts the airy-fairy drive, and nibbles away just enough to make the batsman look silly

gorgeous shot! He seems adept at pulling these off. The ball is climbing on him. It almost seems like it gathers pace off the pitch. But who cares about all that. Markram gets his body beside it, gets up on his toes so he's on top of the bounce and clatters it between point and cover.
on the other side now, through midwicket, Very measured from Markram, responding to the bowler moving round the wicket with a simple dink through a yawning gap
blocks a full delivery outside off
half an appeal for lbw as de Kock plays for turn but the good length ball from round the wicket just goes on with the arm. Might have slide down leg
works off the back foot, trying to flick the flatter delivery through midwicket. Doesn't even go past the pitch
low full toss outside leg, he flicks it to mid-on
cuts the ball even though it's coming into off stump, hunting it almost. No run to point
full on off stump, drives to long-off
pushes a length ball to short midwicket
length ball on middle and leg, works this to deep square leg
punches straight to point

run out missed! A direct hit at the bowler's end by Mahmudullah from mid-off and Markram would've been walking back. Wasn't even in the frame. Markram was deep inside the crease as he punched, took off instinctively for a run. So much risk for one run. Ain't worth it

appeal for lbw but de Kock may have been saved by an inside edge. Looks to work this full delivery on the stumps through midwicket, better off playing straight. Replays confirm the angle was taking the ball down leg too, even if there wasn't an inside-edge
hits this straight to mid-off, off the thick inside edge. Excellent control from Mustafizur. Top, top bowling. Pressure building.
edged and four! No first slip. He would've lapped this up. Runs away to the third man boundary
eased to long-off
works this down to long-on as they jog the single
dabs down to short third man
rocks back and cuts but hits it straight to point. That's a boundary ball not taken toll of
pristine drive to cover point, a misfield gives them a single
flatter one on middle and leg, punched to deep midwicket
mistimes this cut to cover. This one also held on to the surface
shot of the afternoon! Too short, he stands tall and punches this between cover and point.
punched to sweeper cover this time, a man placed specifically for that
dabs this into the off side, looks for a single but can't get it
slower and fuller on the stumps, punched back. Good stop off his own bowling.
leading edge, but safe! Lobs over gully and races to the boundary.
tucks this to midwicket
punched to long-on as they jog the single
drifting into the pads, worked to backward square leg

dropped but Mushfiqur makes amends But guess what? De Kock has been run out. Bangladeshi fans go from agony to ecstasy in a matter of two milliseconds. De Kock looks to cut, but gets a thin edge that is put down. Clearly nervous, he takes off for a run but is left high and dry as Markram doesn't move. Mushfiqur has the presence of mind to run quickly to his right, pick up the ball and hit the stumps at the striker's end to catch him well short. Brain fade from de Kock.
tucks this into the gap at square leg for an easy single
mix-up, mix-up but they complete the run, weak throw at the bowler's end from Shakib at midwicket.
skids one back in from around the stumps, punched to point
quicker one angling in from wide of the crease, defended
goes right back and across as he defends from the crease
driven down to long-off as they jog the single. Pressure building.
bunts this with the spin into the covers
right behind the line as he defends
welcomed with a rasping cut shot, down to deep point
full and swinging away from outside off, driven to sweeper cover
punched on the up to deep cover
slips this length ball on middle and leg, tucks this to deep square
defended from the crease
punches down to long-on for an easy single
lunges forward and defends back to the bowler
punches this down to long-on
gets well forward and turns this to the leg side
squeezes this down to long-on, past the diving short midwicket fielder
slices the drive to deep cover
too full, driven hard to long-off
length ball on middle and leg, turned to midwicket
punched down to mid-off, was looking to force this on the up through cover.
half-chance at midwicket but can't get a hand to it. Faf will be relieved. Mashrafe bangs it in, not good enough at 120kph, Faf pulls and just eludes the leaping fielder.
works this down to mid-on as they hare across
punches to mid-on, they complete the run again
works this down to deep square leg
turns this into the leg side as they scamper a quick single
tapped wide of cover, this one kept a touch low
skids one straight on, punched to cover
drilled down to Tamim at long-on
too much flight, belted down the ground but straight to long-on again
gentle push down the ground to long-on, five singles of that over.
stands tall and punches to mid-on
sliding down leg, works this down to fine leg
pristine drive! Slower, fuller and Faf crashes this between cover and mid-off

width and he slaps this to the cover boundary. Mind you, there was a sweeper who was no more than 10 yards away but the ball just kept going away from him. First one off the frontfoot, now off the backfoot. Superb from Faf
turns this full delivery from outside off to midwicket
works this to midwicket
eases the drive to deep point
gentle dab into the point region as they steal a quick single
eases this past the bowler to long-off
goes right back and across as he turns this in-drifter to the leg side
punched wide of the bowler to long-off
makes room and punches this to extra cover.
extra bounce off the deck, nips back in too, bunted to midwicket
tucks this into the leg side for an easy single
punches this slower delivery to long-on
tremendous use of the bottom hand as he stands tall and punches this on the up through extra cover. Top shot
works this incoming short of length delivery to deep midwicket
balance perfect as he whips this down to long-on
flatter off break on leg, he punches straight to midwicket
flatter and straighter, he tries to punch on the up to long on but midwicket cuts it off
fuller on middle, driven firmly to long this time
slower on leg, no turn, he's back and wheeling this to deep forward square
fuller, he drives back to the bowler
he charges early to a ball darted into leg, he whips this through square leg
looped up outside off, he punches to point but the skipper makes a superb diving stop
slower on off, he sits back and forces this firmly to long off
good length, hint of turn, he punches on the up to long off

Bowled him! 250 wickets for Shakib and this was a beauty! He flighted this but undercut it a touch, Markram played back expecting it to grip and sit up, it zipped on with the arm, went through the gate, crashed into middle and leg!
tossed up, he shuffles out and drives to long on

drifting into leg, he is back and nudging this to midwicket to pinch a tight one, Mehidy swoops but tried throw as he was diving and collecting and sprayed the throw miles wide of the keeper and concedes another run!
shorter, he's back and punching to deep cover
darted way down the leg side and Mushfiqur can't glove it as it spins further down leg! Five wides
darted into leg stump, he's back and working this through forward square
drifting into leg, he's back and glancing this to short fine
full toss, he just drives with a bottom hand punch to long off
tossed up on off, he drives straight to cover
fired in quickly, he drives straight back to the bowler
tossed up with some grip and turn back into Miller, he defends from the crease
tossed up higher, he's forward and defending again
flatter on leg, he clips this with the turn through square leg
looped very high outside off, he waited and hammered this at cover but the man at cover gets a hand on it to slow it down and it runs to long off
floated outside off, he covers up in defence
flatter on off, he's back and working this straight to midwicket
drifting down leg, he glances this behind square and a misfield in the ring allows them to get a couple
he dances down, not quite to the pitch but pushes on the up through cover
full outside off, a square drive to deep cover-point
flatter on off, he's back and working this with the bottom hand through midwicket
fuller, he jabs this with the bottom hand on the bounce back to the bowler
flatter and fuller again, he pushes it off the front foot to cover
tossed up on middle, he stays leg side and pushes it to cover
skips down the track and works this straight to midwicket
shorter, pitching outside leg, he's back and whipping this to deep midwicket
pushed through on middle, he stays still and punches to long on
dances down the track and drives neatly to long off
shorter length, he sits back and pulls powerfully but straight to deep midwicket
flatter on off, he is back and punching this firmly to deep cover-point
shorter, he backs away outside leg and whacks this straight back and at Mosaddek
drifting into leg, he whips this through square leg with a flourish
flatter on leg, he drives off the back foot down to long on
he backs away and hits this off the back foot over the fence at wide long off! This skill and power required for that is staggering! What a way to reach 50!
fuller, and he lofts this on the front foot wide of mid off, he sliced this, didn't time it and gets a couple
good length, wide of off, he sits back and runs this down to third man
he shapes early and ramps a length ball fine of fine leg! Great sill again. It was premeditated but executed to perfection.
back of a length, outside off, he punches this straight to cover and is frustrated he couldn't find the gap
good length on leg, he's whipping this through square leg to the sweeper
good length, outside off, 120kph, he opens the face on the front foot and runs it to third man
back of a length, on off, he works this off the back foot to long on
looped up outside off, he gets back and across and works this to the gap at square leg and runs brilliantly to pick up two
tossed up higher, he clips this to deep midwicket
drifting into leg stump, he works this behind square

Bowled him! Faf what have you done? Beautiful delivery from Mehidy. He tossed it up higher and slower, lured the South African skipper down the track, he tried to launch it down the ground, it gripped and spun through the gate and crashed into leg stump to spark wild celebrations from the Bangladesh team and fans
tossed up outside off, he stretches forward and defends
flatter outside off, no turn, he defends with an open face to point
good length, he drives on the up down through mid on
fuller, he drives neatly to the gap at deep cover and they get an easy two with good placement and running
good length, 116kph, slower ball, he stands and drives straight to cover
back of a length, 118kph, he stands tall and defends into the off side
good length, 126kph, wide of off, he drives through cover to the long boundary and again the sweeper can't prevent two. The skipper was none too pleased
angled into leg, he glances neatly wide of fine leg for another easy two
drifting outside leg, he whips this through forward square but they only get one this time as the sweeper races in
shorter length, he hammers this off the back foot but can't beat cover
full toss, he misses out, mistimes it back to the bowler
good length outside off, he punches off the back foot to deep point
tossed up on off, he defends this manipulating wide of cover for one
tossed high outside off, he drives firmly but can't beat cover
shorter length, he's back and punching this to long on
tossed up outside off, he sits back and forces this with the turn to deep cover-point
dropped at mid off by Soumya! Miller tried to loft this over mid off but hit it flatter, Soumya had to jump up on the circle but he got both hands to it and spilled it! They got two
tossed up again, he shuffles down and drives along the ground to long on
skips down and mows this in the air flat past midwicket! It wasn't in control but he found the gap and it raced away

sliced high in the air over cover and long off runs around but can't quite get there! It was just out of reach , always spinning away, the throw in was untidy and the bowler failed to collect it and allowed another run
darted into leg stump, he works this though square leg
very full, he drives inside out straight to cover
tossed up, he drives this wide of cover, nicely timed into the gap to get a couple
flatter and quicker on off, he's back and forcing this down the ground to long off
fired in quickly to middle, he pushes firmly down to long on for one
knee high full toss, Miller just casually punched it to the long off sweeper. Mosaddek got away with that one
tossed up outside off, he mistimes a drive but drags it towards long on
tossed up on leg, he glances this fine, straight to short fine leg
angled into leg, he works this to the gap at square leg
higher and slower outside off, he pushes with an open face to point
flatter on off, he's back to create room, punching to long off
he sweeps powerfully behind square! Got the length he wanted, drifting in to off and he sweeps hard with the angle to the gap behind square. Good shot. He waited and waited and was rewarded
angled into leg, he's back and working this to deep square
full on off, he drives firmly and neatly to long off
flatter on off, he drives to long off
flatter round arm into middle, he punches from the crease but Shakib can't cut it off at cover and it runs to long off

nearly bowled him and it goes for four byes! Oh this was so close! It was shorter, he backed away to cut, he was beaten by extra bounce and it just went over the bails, past Mushfiqur's gloves and runs away !
fuller on off, he drives neatly to long on
good length, angled across, 130kph, he square drives on the up to deep point
131kph, shorter length, he's jumping back, surprised by some extra bounce, knocking this down into the off side

missed by Mahmudullah at third man! It was upper cut to third man, Mahmudullah stalled coming in off the rope, misjudging it, and it dropped short. He should have caught that. Or at least got hands to it.
he works this off the pads behind square
good length, angled in, he gets a thick inside edge onto pad and it rolls behind him
tailing into the pad, he glances this neatly with the angle to fine leg
129kph, good length, top of off, he's forced to defend off the back foot
135kph, too short and he swivels on the pull and whacks it past short fine! Can't deliver that line and length when fine leg is up. Miller just had to place it after seizing on the length
good length, outside off, he forces this from the crease to point
good length, 134kph, wide of off, he stands up to drive through cover bit drags this off the toe of the bat to long on
good length, angled into off, 133kph, he pushed this towards long on but Mehidy whips across to make the stop
full and tailing into the pads but it's going way down leg despite the loud appeal from the crowd
137kph, bouncer, way too high and correctly called. Mushfiqur had to jump up to knock it down

leading edge caught at backward point! Super catch from Mehidy! This flew to him. It was full and angling into middle, Miller tried to whip it through midwicket with hard hands and he closed the bat face as the ball pitched and straightened a touch. It flew off the leading edge, head high to Mehidy at backward point and he clung on with two cool hands and a calm mind!
135kph, tailing down leg, he glances this with the angle to fine leg
nearly a run out! Mehidy again! It was pushes to cover-point, Mehidy swooped, van der Dussen ran but was rightly sent back, the throw was just wide of the stumps!
sliced in the air just past cover, and out to deep cover-point
shorter length, into the ribs, he knocks this down behind square
good length, 124kph, off stump line, he defends to cover
looks to drill this through cover but gets a thickish inside edge back
eased into the covers for a single
gets to the pitch of the ball as he works it to long-off
pressure builds, another dot. Looks to force this through extra cover but hits it straight to the fielder
superb stop off his own bowling, diving to his right off his own bowling.
drifting into the pads, works it to deep midwicket

Mustafizur has turned this game bigtime, or has he? Given out and JP Duminy reviews. Cuts back in from outside off on a length, JP is hurried into a defensive stroke which he tries to execute from the crease, but it's the fizz (no pun intended) that does him in. Hit high on the pad but mind you he was rooted to the crease and the ball didn't have much distance to travel. Clear gap between bat and pad, only thing to see was if it would've hit the stumps. Ball tracking says no so the original decision has been reversed. Huge relief for South Africa
slips this full delivery down leg
chops this forceful cur past the keeper, to short third man
miscue but this lands safely, bounces away towards square third man and hey come back for the second
he's clobbered this over long-on! Length ball, picked it early, held his shape and walloped it when it arrived.
width and he's crashed this behind point, tracer bullet stuff. Is there another twist to the game? Rassie is on the move.
squeezes this drive to mid-off for a quick single
drifting into middle and leg, he works this to deep square leg
chipped over the infield to sweeper cover, excellent running
steps out and lunges forward a little more as he smothers this.
swept from outside off, dragged to deep square leg
gentle nudge wide of midwicket
gets well forward and dabs it into the off side, looks for a single but is sent back

oh, dear. Oh, dear. Accuse me of jinxing or whatever later. Got to say this was a poor shot. Looks for an ugly hoick across the line but misses it all together. Saifuddin went full, went straight and found timber.
gentle dab from the crease to the off side.
chops this to point, looking for width when there was none
nice and full on the stumps, defends this into the covers
hint of reverse away as he attacks the stumps with a full delivery, defended.
uppish, but lands short of mid-off. Maiden over, top over
punches this to deep point
carved away, into the gap. This is a top shot, stood still, deep in the crease to belt this half-volley to the cover boundary
pulled to deep midwicket
squeezes this drive into the gap at deep cover for another two
whippy pull down to deep backward square, good stop
toe-ends the drive to long-off
steps out and hits this straight back to the bowler
goes for an audacious reverse sweep, played too early, allowing Shakib to alter his length, beaten.
lobbed but just short of Mashrafe at extra cover
sliding down leg, JP uses the depth of the crease to help it on its way past short fine leg. Welcome boundary
rocks back to cut but this one keeps a touch low, beaten
gentle bunt into the off side for a quick single
thick edge, squirted past short third man. Excellent start to the over, the game is still alive. Went for the yorker, right idea. Not much wrong with the delivery
cutter, length on the shorter side, pulled to deep square leg
slower length ball angling away, Andile waits and waits, initially looking to slash over point, before he leaves. Wide called
full and straight outside leg, drilled to long-on
punches this to deep cover

full toss and he's sliced this straight to the man at the edge of the ring at cover. Looked to back away and whack this over the infield, didn't get enough bat on it. Good, low catch by Shakib. South Africa right on the edge.
full and straight on the stumps, squeezed back to the bowler
steps out to go over long-on, gets a thick inside edge to midwicket
cut away to deep point
sharp turn back into middle and leg, works this to midwicket
eased into the gap at sweeper cover, they'll come back for the second quite comfortably
whips this down to long-on, looking for the big hit but didn't get the connection he would've liked
mistimes this hoick to long-on
slower ball gone wrong, bowls this too far wide outside off
slower bouncer, Morris waits and decides it's worth leaving it for height. No-ball called, free-hit time It also happened to be a frontfoot no-ball
backs away and squeezes this full yorker to deep cover
makes room and eases this to deep cover
superb yorker, right into the base of leg stump, squeezed into the leg side
can't put away this full toss, toe-ends it wide of cover
slower length ball outside off, forces this to deep cover
cutter on middle, can't get much power behind the pull but it's into the gap at deep midwicket. They scamper back for the second
looks to pull, gets this high on the bat. No timing, rolls to long-on
play and a miss. Excellent delivery, another cutter, this one's a touch fuller. It grips the surface and deviates a fair bit. Morris through with the swing as he looks to slap over cover.
slashed away this time, bounces past the deep cover fielder. Good hit, they need many more of these. Morris held his shape, waited a touch and then powered it away

walks across and swings this full toss straight don the throat of deep midwicket. The crowd roars, the stuffed tiger toys are thrown in the air by the fans. The flags are out and Bangladesh inch closer to a famous win. Morris was targetting the short boundary but just didn't get enough bat on it.
slips this length ball down leg, tucked to fine leg
yorker on middle, gets it to tail away a touch, squeezed to long-off
bunted to long-off, got to look for the big hits. Where's the golfer's swing?

into the gap between deep midwicket and wide long-on. Valiant effort there around the ropes. This was full and straight, JP cleared his front leg and whipped this. Soumya with the dive but ended up parrying it to the ropes.

waits, waits and cracks this slower length ball into the gap at deep cover. Splendid strike this. Held his shape, stayed right back inside the crease and scythed it away. Hand-eye coordination - superb
yorker-length again, drilled to long-on
beaten as he looks to drive this full delivery that tails away a touch

dragged on! This is a slower bouncer, JP backs away and looks to pull, through with the stroke early as this goes back onto the stumps right off the toe-end. Surely it's all over for South Africa now? What a performance from The Fizz.
swing and a miss. Good ball, went full and across
beaten again as he looks to loft this slower delivery, superb.
beaten again! This is shortish from around the stumps, looks to cut but is late on the shot
steered into the gap at square third man for a couple
is this the game? No. Sliced in the air, was up for a long time but long-off couldn't quite get underneath that despite a slide. Two more to the total.
thick outside edge of this full toss, goes fine to short third man. Tahir started running, Rabada didn't respond but eventually made it
swung away to fine leg
yorker-length outside off, squeezed to deep cover
sliced into the off side, cover and point thought the other would go for it. No one did in the end. Mehidy and Shakib the two men
mistimes a lofted hit to long-on
squeezes this yorker-length ball down the ground
clean swing, solid swing. All the way for six. Fetched this from outside off and deposited this over the long boundary at deep midwicket. SA need five more of those
squeezes this full delivery to mid-off, they don't run
hits it high on the bat, down to long-on off this full toss
beaten by a cutter, another slower ball. Backed away a bit too much to go over the off side
sliced over cover, down towards the sweeper cover region, two more
squeezes this cutter to deep point, let the party begin. What a win, what a way to start the tournament!
